a1: Standard Roman numerals support 1 to 3999 (I to MMMCMXCIX).
a2: Roman numerals use letters: I=1, V=5, X=10, L=50, C=100, D=500, M=1000. Subtractive notation (IV=4) is supported.
q3: Can I convert Roman to numbers?
a3: Yes, switch to "Roman to Number" mode and enter Roman numerals.
a4: Roman numerals have no representation for zero.
